Lyric:
[by:月下清菏檐下猫]
[00:00.32]I was halfway up on the wings of a fantasy
[00:09.17]Looking out for love, didn't know what was good for me
[00:16.24]I stay out every night
[00:18.29]And live it up, live it up, live it up, live it up now baby
[00:22.82]But nothing feels the same
[00:25.10]I'd rather be with you
[00:29.91]Then I look into his eyes and I realize
[00:33.76]I'd rather be with you
[00:38.85]Though I try to trick myself, there's nobody else
[00:42.49]I'd rather be with you
[00:51.14]I'd rather be with you
[00:57.38]
[01:01.44]Fillings days with distractions, only a waste of time
[01:10.19]No one can compare, only you made me come alive
[01:17.46]You're the one I need
[01:19.30]So give it up, give it up, give it up now baby
[01:23.83]You only have to say
[01:25.98]I'd rather be with you
[01:31.14]Then I look into his eyes and I realize
[01:34.82]I'd rather be with you
[01:39.93]Though I try to trick myself, there's nobody else
[01:43.68]I'd rather be with you
[01:52.24]I'd rather be with you
[01:58.44]
[02:03.14]No more fighting, need to get your love
[02:07.47]I know you're trouble, but you're my number one
[02:11.90]And I'm gonna leave it all behind
[02:14.77]Cause I'd rather be with you
[02:22.84]I'd rather be with you
[02:28.04]Then I look into his eyes and I realize
[02:31.44]I'd rather be with you
[02:36.74]Though I try to trick myself
[02:40.35]I'd rather be with you
[02:45.51]Then I look into his eyes and I realize
[02:48.94]I'd rather be with you
[02:54.14]Though I try to trick myself, there's nobody else
[02:57.76]I'd rather be with you
[03:06.35]I'd rather be with you
[03:12.60]And I realize, and I realize...
[03:16.36]
